TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, it's a ROFLcopter, it goes SOI SOI SOI SOI SOI SOI

I wish my dreams would stop being filled with Ponies.

Granted, your dreams are now filled with Tinker Bell and her fairy friends.

I wish I didn't have to work a 10 day work week this week (and next week technically)

Edited October 31, 2013 by BFGfreak

Granted, now you work for 365 days per week EVER YEAR.

I wish KSP mod files didn't cause lag.

Granted, but your computer runs so well it blows up

I wish that society wasnt forcing me to watch MLP

*grumbles about continuing the series*

Granted. You realize that you are really watching it because you like it.

I wish for Portal III.

Granted, but its the next Duke Nukem Forever

I wish society wasnt forcing me to like MLP as well.

Granted, it's burn you alive because you know it. (Actualy, the society is not forcing you to love it, it's just because you are an hipster .)

I wish people was not posting about their mental problems (Actualy, I've done that )

Granted. They now come directly to your door to tell you about them.

I wish a thread would *cough*derailintopwnys*cough*

Granted. You're dead.

I wish nothing.

Granted, the universe end, then, nothing...

I wish for decent wishes

Wish denied.

i wish fo-

Granted, that was your last sentace

I wish for a Corgi with a monocle.

you get a corgi with a lazer-shooting monocle that shoots you.

i wish for... pizza

Granted, but its all made out of raw sewage.

I wish for a Friendly corgi with a monocle.

Granted, but its all made out of raw sewage.

I wish for a Friendly corgi with a monocle.

Granted. he is friendly. the monocle is not. you get blasted again

I wish for a TORTODRO-

Granted, you stop making posts cutting off with -

I wish for a friendly corgi with a friendly monocle.

Granted, but the monocle turns evil. repeat.

I wish for a tortodrone! :3

Granted, It kills you

I wish that I had a Great Dane with a eye patch.

it dies. you cruel monster

i wish you knew what a tortodrone is.

Granted, a ninja kills you

I wish to have more fellow ninja

Granted, you get sent to ninja limbo!

I WI- i said, i wish for CAKE!

Granted, but its fish core cake

I wish for a sanvitch

granted, but the scout kills you before you can eat it.

I wish it was Friday.

Granted, Rebecca Black comes and sings Friday in your ears 5ever.

I wish people knew what 5ever means.

Granted, people use it in the place of everywor

5ever 5ever 5ever 5ever 5ever
